Html:
Hi. It's a great work. Thanks for it.

I would like to know if I can re create my ex WPF business app using this tool.

After looking in to your sample app, I recognized that the pages I want to load into the stage (or main window or ...) must be linked via <mui:Link.

But in a business app it is not good to include more pages (may be 100s) like this. Can I create a toolbar (something like the ribbon in my previous app) add include buttons for loading pages?

You cannot create a toolbar, as it goes against metro design principles.

However, you can try to create a home page tab with buttons linking to different pages.
MUI doesn't enforce you to use the page link model. You may choose any navigation model you like. You can even start with a completely empty window if you want. See this document page for more info.
